title: Copy Trading Has ‘Disrupted the Crypto Industry’ Says Bitget’s Gracy Chen
description: Copy trading has disrupted the crypto industry and is increasingly the trading strategy preferred by less experienced traders says Gracy Chen, managing director of the crypto trading platform Bitget. While copy trading is gaining popularity globally, traders and prospective users from Africa appear more interested in the strategy than those from other regions. Africa-Based Users […]

title: Can AI Chatbots in Healthcare Earn Patients’ Trust?
description: The widespread adoption of AI chatbots in healthcare has been met with both enthusiasm and skepticism. title: How to Spend Crypto From Your Wallet With Gnosis Pay
